title: Cooccurrence of NDM-1, ESBL, RmtC, AAC(6 ')-Ib, and QnrB in Clonally Related Klebsiella pneumoniae Isolates Together with Coexistence of CMY-4 and AAC(6 ')-Ib in Enterobacter cloacae Isolates from Saudi Arabia
